name: ITLibMediaItemMediaKind
desc: These constants specify the possible media kinds of a media item.

items.name: case kindUnknown
items.desc: The media item kind is unknown.

items.name: case kindSong
items.desc: The media item is a song.

items.name: case kindMovie
items.desc: The media item is a movie.

items.name: case kindPodcast
items.desc: The media item is an audio or a video podcast.

items.name: case kindAudiobook
items.desc: The media item is an audiobook.

items.name: case kindPDFBooklet
items.desc: The media item is an unwrapped PDF file that’s part of a music album.

items.name: case kindMusicVideo
items.desc: The media item is a music video.

items.name: case kindTVShow
items.desc: The media item is a TV show.

items.name: case kindInteractiveBooklet
items.desc: The media item is a QuickTime movie with embedded Flash.

items.name: case kindHomeVideo
items.desc: The media item is a non-iTunes Store movie.

items.name: case kindRingtone
items.desc: The media item is an iOS ringtone.

items.name: case kindDigitalBooklet
items.desc: The media item is an iTunes Extra or an iTunes LP item.

items.name: case kindIOSApplication
items.desc: The media item is an iOS app.

items.name: case kindVoiceMemo
items.desc: The media item is a recorded voice memo.

items.name: case kindiTunesU
items.desc: The media item is an iTunes U audio or video file.

items.name: case kindBook
items.desc: The media item is an EPUB file or an iBooks Author book.

items.name: case kindPDFBook
items.desc: The media item is a PDF file that iTunes treats as a book unless the user overrides it.

items.name: case kindAlertTone
items.desc: The media item is an audio tone that’s not a protected ringtone on an iOS device.
